Statute.Title: Criminal Code (Language of Accused), An Act to amend the
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Code criminel (Langue de l’accusé), Loi modifiant le)

CIF.Text: CIF, R.S., c. 2 (1st Supp.), Act in force 01.01.90 see R.S., c. 31 (4th Supp.), ss. 95 and 209(4)
CIF, R.S., c. 27 (1st Supp.), s. 188 in force 04.12.85 see SI/85‑211
